Function Documentation

std::string BWUtil::formatPath ( const std::string &  pathToFormat  ) 

This method makes certain that the path contains a trailing folder separator.

Parameters:
path The path string to be formatted.
Returns:
The path with a trailing folder separator.

std::string BWUtil::executableDirectory (  ) 

This method returns the directory component of the current process' executable file location.

void BWUtil::sanitisePath ( std::string &  path  ) 

This method converts a path into a path that is useable by BigWorld.

Primarily this is used to convert windows paths: Example c: -> c:/bigworld/fantasydemo

Parameters:
path The path to sanatise.

Retrieves the path from a file.

file file to get path of.
Returns:
path string

This method returns the full path (including executable filename) of the current process' executable file.
